name: Gunner Fish
description:
You have been a gunner yet? Want to become a keen shot? Please play the Fish Gunner Game. In addition to your life is not a gunner, but in the game you prove that he is a talented individual marksmanship hunter. In the game you assume the role of a hunter ocean equipped with sophisticated weapons, modern guns to conquer and became lord Ocean. Conquer the vast ocean, you have your fish hunt funding, we will bring you: gold, precious stones, pearls ... it's vast legacy and expensive gia.Vi so, players must hunt as many fish as you get more gold coins, precious stones, pearls ... increase your level of wealth. Let's prove that he is a keen hunter fish go yet ...
For how to play simple, eye-catching graphics under ocean romantic scenery.
The diverse types of guns, weapons with vivid sound effects create a sense of entertainment for players.
Especially in ofline player mode you can save online when point or 3G internet connection. More interesting is that you can share games on social networks introduce friends to play the game Gunner Fish.
I wish you happy gaming, fish soon became a professional hunter!
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
